tweets.text: Lazy . Biased towards the side of harmful industries that put profit over people . Gaslighting . To name but a few . Chronic failures . @EnvAgency https://t.co/AIdGE5shXu

Landfill update: it‚Äôs emerged that in May 2020, hydrogen sulphide levels on site were measured at 4610ppm! 20ppm can cause eye irritation; 1000ppm can cause death.

@EnvAgencyMids you let this happen. Why is the site still taking waste today? https://t.co/G4L1hSmuNb

So @RedIndustries2 is this all you have to say to Matthew's mum? How about an apology for a start and then cap it off and get the hell out of our town you are not welcome. @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK get it sorted.
@StinkStopthe #HumanRightsViolations #MentalHealthAwarenessWeek https://t.co/LUTXGMHRZ2 https://t.co/Vj4pSnvRrf

This is your legacy @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @DefraUKAir @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @MattBofStoke @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson #stopthestink https://t.co/HdTMH0K7OY

tweets.text: Work to re-naturalise the Smestow Brook at Smestow Valley Local Nature Reserve begins today. This will alter the flow of water to create habitat diversity and increase species diversity through planting. We'll also organise litter clean ups. Diggers will be on site until Thursday https://t.co/0xCytObB5I

At what point will our politicians start earning some respect by getting the Environment Agency to use its EXISTING powers to prosecute the water companies for this persistent abuse of the permits to dump!
@robertcourts @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/o4DwKuw1eq

tweets.text: These bureaucratic bottleneck is a panacea for more health crisis. The facts are public knowledge, yet the govt seems unable to protect the health of local residents. @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg & other local leaders should continue to make this known to higher authorities!

@SimonTagg @Helen_Clinton @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL Held accountable the company wants closing down directors prosecuted and the company assets paid out as compensation to the households that have been affected because at the end of the day they have profited whilst committing criminal acts as the environmental agency said 5 times

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids 4610 ppm on site readings and you did nothing!! Are you trying to kill someone!! @DefraGovUK This needs looking into. It's like they want someone to die #stopthestink #firethelot https://t.co/3O6yPBazC2

Come on @EnvAgency this is unforgiveable in a SSSI and SAC running though a nature reserve! Why aren't you addressing this? Please help us @ChrisGPackham #pollution #environment #biodiversity https://t.co/Y9dh8U7ZnO

tweets.text:
An excellent letter from @NewsNBC, calling again for an independent investigation into the long-term failures in the regulation of Walley's Quarry by the @EnvAgency.

I will be quoting from this letter in my @HouseofCommons debate tomorrow evening (expected shortly after 7pm). https://t.co/FYNgbvmckV
